programme.desc: Tiny Dancer / The Sleepy Sun - Dora shows the twins a music box with a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life! Bailarina's adelita boots run away, so we need to get them back.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Bouncy Tires - When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of Super Bouncy Tires, he bounces out of control!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Scoop - When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The Party Animal - When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Working Like a Sharkdog - All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm - Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it!

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep711
programme.desc: The Yucky Ducky - When the Yucky Ducky covers Axle City in icky, sticky grossigoo, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to stop her machine and save the world from being grossified... forever!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Hamster Vikings / Who Ate Harry's Homework? - The hamsters go on a Viking dinner cruise with Harry and his family. // Greg must clear his name when Harry's homework goes missing and all clues point to him.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep96
programme.desc: Take Off - Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep20
programme.desc: T - Dee encourages a friend to say 't', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet a turtle, shake our tails and see a tiger in a tall tent!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Queen Mae-Mae - Mae-Mae is queen for the day, the rest of the friends can't wait to play in Mae-Mae's new kingdom. When she takes the game a little too far, Queen Mae-Mae tries to put things right and restore harmony in the Pop Paper City Kingdom.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Ice Ice Messy - Messy's new friend is in a spot of hot bother! They go on an icy adventure to the South Pole, the desert and the mountains to help.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Pizza Girls - Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tulip Fields, Netherlands - Is Glitch stealing tulips from the Netherlands? That's what the Go Jetters think!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Himalayan Heroes, Nepal - Hoping to follow in his great-aunt's footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hotel - Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them how to compromise.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Andy and The Coati - Andy takes to the skies in his safari-mobile, jetting off to the Amazon rainforest in search of a coati he needs a picture of.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mission: Bandage Team - Sylvie the therapy dog helps a little boy called Ben feel brave enough to see the doctor.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Control - The pirates find an old remote control, Captain Captain realises she can use it to control her crew!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep38
programme.desc: The Nature Badge - The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep37
programme.desc: The Dos and Don'ts Badge - The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep36
programme.desc: The Exercise Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Great Mosque of Djenne, Africa - Grandmaster Glitch is invited to Djenne in Mali, Africa, to visit the people and to see one of his favourite things at work - mud.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep707

Tom Aspinall recounts his UFC debut in Day One. Paddy Pimblett takes us through his top 5 British UFC fighters of all time.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC305DuPlessisvsAdesanya
programme.desc: Perth, Australia is the place as UFC presents a showdown that will shake the foundation of MMA. All this and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 313: Pereira vs. Ankalaev
programme.desc: Prelims - After a historic 2024 campaign that saw him step into the Octagon three times in defense of his UFC light heavyweight title and emerge with three knockout victories, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a UFC 313 main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev on March 9. A Russian powerhouse who is unbeaten for over six years, Ankalaev will now try to decipher the puzzle presented by Poatan, one of the most dominant champions in the world. Plus, high-level action is guaranteed when lightweights Justin Gaethje and Dan Hooker meet in a highly anticipated co-main event.

programme.title: UFC 313: Pereira vs. Ankalaev
programme.desc: Prelims - After a historic 2024 campaign that saw him step into the Octagon three times in defense of his UFC light heavyweight title and emerge with three knockout victories, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a UFC 313 main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev on March 9. A Russian powerhouse who is unbeaten for over six years, Ankalaev will now try to decipher the puzzle presented by Poatan, one of the most dominant champions in the world. Plus, high-level action is guaranteed when lightweights Justin Gaethje and Dan Hooker meet in a highly anticipated co-main event.
